prompt: <description>Part 1: Construct a rectangular prism Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0, 0, 0 and a translation vector of 0, 0, 0. Create a face and a loop consisting of 8 curves: 1. Line from 0, 0.2 to 0, 0.325 2. Line from 0, 0.325 to 0.75, 0.325 3. Line from 0.75, 0.325 to 0.75, 0 4. Line from 0.75, 0 to 0.625, 0 5. Line from 0.625, 0 to 0.6, 0 6. Arc from 0.6, 0 with midpoint at 0.5625, 0.0375 and endpoint at 0.6, 0.075 7. Line from 0.6, 0.075 to 0.625, 0.075 8. Line from 0.625, 0.075 to 0.625, 0.2 9. Line from 0.625, 0.2 to 0, 0.2 The loop should be closed. Extrude the resulting shape by 0.15 units in the normal direction to create the first part. Part 2: Construct a cylindrical hole Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of 180, 0, -90 and a translation vector of 0.1375, 0.325, 0.0312. Create two faces each with one loop. The first loop consists of: 1. Line from 0.0437, 0 to 0.0437, 0.0875 2. Arc from 0.0437, 0.0875 with midpoint at 0, 0.0438 and endpoint at 0.0437, 0 The second loop consists of: 1. Line from 0.0437, 0 to 0.0437, 0.0875 2. Arc from 0.0437, 0.0875 with midpoint at 0.0875, 0.0438 and endpoint at 0.0437, 0 These loops should be closed. Extrude the resulting shapes by -0.625 units in the opposite direction of the normal to create the second part, effectively cutting a cylindrical hole in the prism. Part 3: Construct a rectangular tab Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of 180, 0, -90 and a translation vector of 0.75, 0.325, 0. Extrude a rectangular shape by 0.25 units in the normal direction to create the third part. The shape should have one face with one loop consisting of the following curves: 1. Line from 0, 0 to 0.575, 0 2. Line from 0.575, 0 to 0.575, 0.15 3. Line from 0.575, 0.15 to 0, 0.15 4. Line from 0, 0.15 to 0, 0 This loop should be closed. The resulting shape should be a rectangular tab. The final shape should be a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole on one of its faces and a rectangular tab on the other. The length of the final shape is 0.75 units, the width is 0.575 units, and the height is 0.15 units.</description>
